entry.title: [GRA2][Webhosting] - ~userid access legacy feature removal
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jun 17, 08:30 - 09:30 UTC

May 16, 06:22 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Web Hosting offer.

Start time : 17/06/2024 08:30 UTC
End time : 17/06/2024 09:30 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : We plan to remove the ~userid access legacy feature in June 2024.
All links with format http(s)://someovhdomain.tld/~userid will have to be replaced by http(s)://yourowndomain.tld or they will end up displaying a "Site not installed" error page.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [GRA][WebPaaS] - Infrastructure Maintenance
entry.content:
May 20, 06:01 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

May 20, 04:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

May 18, 03:42 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our "Web PaaS" offer.

Start time : 20/05/2024 04:00 UTC
End time : 20/05/2024 06:00 UTC
Service impact : All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade; Integrations and webhooks may fail during the maintenance, and you may notice increased deployment times.
Service improvement : Our partner communicated to OVHCloud that they will be doing a maintenance on OVHCLOUD-FR-1 region to release the latest features, bug fixes and performance updates.
